title: Headrush - (2000) Distance [EP]  {MP3-192}

HEADRUSH - DISTANCE [EP]

-------------------------------------------------
Artist..: Headrush
Album...: Distance
Label...: Self Released, Indie
Genre...: Hardcore
Rip.date: 08/21/2000
Rel.date: 00/00/2000
#tracks.: 5
Size....: 24MB
-------------------------------------------------

About Headrush:
===============
These guys were/are a Hardcore/Rapcore outfit out of New Jersey.
Their website, www.headrushnj.com , seems now defunct - all gone, BUT..

You can still check them out on MYSPACE:

Misc. NOTES:
============
DISTANCE, was a Year 2000 Indie [EP] Release that showed up in MP3 format on a few "0-Day" Servers at the time.
Going through my olf MP3 collection, I decided to RE-UP this one, just for old time&#039;s sake.

I LOVED this EP from the first time I listed to it and hoped that these guys would eventually get signed.

Unfortunately, it seems that they still have not (from their MySpace Info).
They list Old-School Metal and HipHop as being Influences.

I still find this entertaining and somewhat &#039;relevant&#039; in terms of musical tastes, even nearly 8 year after the fact.

---------------------------------------------------

I MEAN THE FOLLOWING STATEMENT(s) AS NON-INSULTING TO EITHER PARTY MENTIONED (in case others don&#039;t agree with my comparisons)

What can I say, other than:
- if you like a "More Pissed Off" sounding Linkin Park....
- if you like a "More RAW" sounding Alexisonfire......
- if you thought the "Judgement Night Soundtrack" sounded a bit "light"....
- if you enjoy the "Good Cop" vs. "Bad Cop" style of dueling Lead Vocalists.....

...Then these guys are for you.

ENJOY !
